status code that indicates the execution status of the function. Check if the RTOS kernel is already started.
0 RTOS is not started, 1 RTOS is started. Get the RTOS kernel system timer counter.

briefdescription.para: The RTOS kernel system timer frequency in Hz.

simplesect.para: Reflects the system timer setting and is typically defined in a configuration file. Convert a microseconds value to a RTOS kernel system timer value.

parameterdescription.para: time value in microseconds.

simplesect.para: time value normalized to the osKernelSysTickFrequency

briefdescription.para: Entry point of a timer call back function.
Status code values returned by CMSIS-RTOS functions.
Pool ID identifies the memory pool.
Message ID identifies the message queue.
Mail ID identifies the mail queue.
Thread Definition structure contains startup information of a thread.
Timer Definition structure contains timer parameters.
Definition structure for memory block allocation.
Create a thread and add it to Active Threads and set it to state READY.

parameterdescription.para: thread definition referenced with osThread.
pointer that is passed to the thread function as start argument.

simplesect.para: thread ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Return the thread ID of the current running thread.

simplesect.para: thread ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error. Change priority of a thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.
new priority value for the thread function.

simplesect.para: status code that indicates the execution status of the function. Get current priority of a thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.

simplesect.para: current priority value of the specified thread. Pass control to next thread that is in state READY.
status code that indicates the execution status of the function. Terminate execution of a thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.

simplesect.para: status code that indicates the execution status of the function. Set the specified Signal Flags of an active thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.
specifies the signal flags of the thread that should be set.

simplesect.para: previous signal flags of the specified thread or 0x80000000 in case of incorrect parameters.

briefdescription.para: Clear the specified Signal Flags of an active thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.
specifies the signal flags of the thread that shall be cleared.

simplesect.para: previous signal flags of the specified thread or 0x80000000 in case of incorrect parameters or call from ISR.

briefdescription.para: Wait for one or more Signal Flags to become signaled for the current RUNNING thread.

parameterdescription.para: wait until all specified signal flags set or 0 for any single signal flag.
CMSIS_RTOS_TimeOutValue or 0 in case of no time-out.

simplesect.para: event flag information or error code.

parameterdescription.para: timer object referenced with osTimer.
osTimerOnce for one-shot or osTimerPeriodic for periodic behavior.
argument to the timer call back function.

simplesect.para: timer ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Create and Initialize a Mutex object.

parameterdescription.para: mutex definition referenced with osMutex.

simplesect.para: mutex ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Create and Initialize a Semaphore object.

parameterdescription.para: semaphore definition referenced with osSemaphore.
maximum and initial number of available tokens.

simplesect.para: semaphore ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Wait until a Semaphore token becomes available.

parameterdescription.para: semaphore object referenced with osSemaphoreCreate.
CMSIS_RTOS_TimeOutValue or 0 in case of no time-out.

simplesect.para: number of available tokens, or -1 in case of incorrect parameters.

briefdescription.para: Create and Initialize a Message Queue object.

parameterdescription.para: message queue definition referenced with osMessageQ.
thread ID (obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId) or NULL.

simplesect.para: message queue ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Put a Message to a Queue.

parameterdescription.para: message queue ID obtained with osMessageCreate.
message information.
CMSIS_RTOS_TimeOutValue or 0 in case of no time-out.

simplesect.para: status code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Get a Message from a Queue or timeout if Queue is empty.

parameterdescription.para: message queue ID obtained with osMessageCreate.
CMSIS_RTOS_TimeOutValue or 0 in case of no time-out.

simplesect.para: event information that includes status code.
